wikitext.*:
'''Dancing with Hobbits''' is a folk music band comprised of musician [[Marc Gunn]] and fiddler Sam Gillogly. They make [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-themed folk dance music. Their first album, released in 2024, was called [[Dancing with Hobbits (album)|Dancing with Hobbits]].
